jobs.title: Commercial Account Manager
jobs.descriptionHtml:
InfluxData is the creator of InfluxDB, the leading time series platform used to collect, store, and analyze all time series data at any scale. Developers can query and analyze their time-stamped data in real-time to discover, interpret, and share new insights to gain a competitive edge. InfluxData is a remote-first company with a globally distributed workforce. For more information, visit www.influxdata.com.

We are looking for a results driven Account Manager to join our Commercial team! In this role, you will manage a portfolio of around 30-40 accounts, focusing on retention while identifying opportunities for growth and incremental ARR. The ideal candidate will have 1-3 years of experience as an Account Manager or Renewals Specialist, with a proven ability to foster relationships and expand account spend.

At this time, we're prioritizing folks who live in the UK.

What you'll be doing

  • Manage a portfolio of customer accounts and renewals with a focus on customer obsession and high retention and satisfaction levels.

  • Lead the renewal process for each account, ensuring customers needs are met, checkins are scheduled and commercial terms align with customer needs and expectations.

  • Identify and implement growth opportunities within your accounts to drive incremental revenue growth. Identify new use cases and new groups that can get value from additional capabilities.

  • Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders within each account.

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Sales, Support, Marketing, etc.) to enhance customer experience and maximize value.

  • Monitor account health and proactively address potential risks to retention and growth.

What we're looking for

  • 1-5 years of experience as an Account Manager or Renewals Specialist, with a focus on driving renewals and growth.

  • Proven ability to manage +50 accounts while balancing renewals and identifying expansion opportunities.

  • Strong communication, negotiation, and relationship building skills.

  • Self motivated with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.

It’s a plus if you have

  • Experience selling open source/SaaS

  • Experience in NoSQL data technologies or other modern data platforms

  • Experience selling enterprise management solutions (Systems Management, Cloud Management, log analytics, APM, Network Monitoring)

Interview Information:

Our interview process begins remotely. Interviews are typically conducted via Zoom. To ensure every candidate can participate, please let us know if you are unable to access Zoom. Some roles may require an in-person meeting with a team member as part of the final stage.

Our Core Values

Our employees are the heart of the company and only by having a core set of beliefs and values will we be successful. We hire and live by these core values:

  • We value each other

  • We get stuff done

  • We believe humility drives learning

  • We embrace failure

  • We are committed to open source

Visit our careers page to learn more about working at InfluxData.

To view our CCPA policies click HERE

If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access this website to apply for a vacancy as a result of your disability. You can request reasonable accommodations by reaching out to the recruiting team by emailing apply@influxdata.com. 

InfluxData does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters and recruitment agencies through our website, job board or directly to employees. InfluxData will not pay fees to any third-party agency, headhunter or company that does not have a signed agreement for this position in place.

Beware of job scams and fraudulent offers! Our recruiters use @influxdata.com email addresses exclusively. We do not conduct interviews via text or instant message and we do not ask candidates to download software other than Zoom, to purchase equipment through us, or to provide sensitive personally identifiable information such as bank accounts or social security numbers. If you have been contacted by someone claiming to be from InfluxData from a different domain about a job offer, please report it as potential job fraud to law enforcement and to jobs@influxdata.com.

You can request reasonable accommodations by reaching out to the recruiting team by emailing apply@influxdata.com. 

InfluxData does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters and recruitment agencies through our website, job board or directly to employees. InfluxData will not pay fees to any third-party agency, headhunter or company that does not have a signed agreement for this position in place.

Beware of job scams and fraudulent offers! Our recruiters use @influxdata.com http://influxdata.com email addresses exclusively. We do not conduct interviews via text or instant message and we do not ask candidates to download software other than Zoom, to purchase equipment through us, or to provide sensitive personally identifiable information such as bank accounts or social security numbers. If you have been contacted by someone claiming to be from InfluxData from a different domain about a job offer, please report it as potential job fraud to law enforcement and to jobs@influxdata.com.

jobs.title: Enterprise Account Executive
jobs.descriptionHtml:
InfluxData is the creator of InfluxDB, the leading time series platform used to collect, store, and analyze all time series data at any scale. Developers can query and analyze their time-stamped data in real-time to discover, interpret, and share new insights to gain a competitive edge. InfluxData is a remote-first company with a globally distributed workforce. For more information, visit www.influxdata.com.

Our sales team is growing at InfluxData and we’re looking for our next Enterprise Account Executive!  If sales is in your blood and you have a track record of closing business, read on.  

You'll be responsible for closing transactions  as well as generating pipeline for our business with mid & large sized organizations. Success for this role is defined by meeting quarterly and annual quota targets. We’re a growing team and company and with that growth there is constant movement and change, so the ability to jump in and learn quickly is key.

What you’ll be doing:

  • Building a sustainable pipeline and managing the entire sales lifecycle

  • Understanding the competitive landscape, & positioning InfluxData to win

  • Building strong relationships and establish trust, both internally and with prospects/customers

  • Building the pipeline through a various methods, including cold calling

  • Forecasting and managing your sales activity and pipeline to meet revenue targets and company goals

  • Meeting or exceeding monthly targets and quarterly quota

  • Managing a book of business and secure renewals

What we’re looking for:

  • +3 years experience selling data solutions, SaaS, or PaaS

  • Superior written and verbal communication skills, able to talk to all levels at an organization

  • Demonstrable history of meeting or exceeding quota

  • Strong prospecting, qualifying, closing and managing skills

  • Excellent negotiation skills

It’s a plus if you have:

  • Relevant Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience

  • Experience selling open source software

  • Experience in NoSQL data technologies or other modern data platforms

  • Experience selling enterprise management solutions (Systems Management, Cloud Management, log analytics, APM, Network Monitoring)

Applications will be accepted on a rolling basis.

Interview Information:

Our interview process begins remotely. Interviews are typically conducted via Zoom. To ensure every candidate can participate, please let us know if you are unable to access Zoom. Some roles may require an in-person meeting with a team member as part of the final stage.

We offer fantastic benefits for full time employees; in the US these include:

  • Medical/dental/vision insurance with 100% coverage for employees and dependents

  • Company contribution to your FSA

  • Flexible Time Off - take the time you need

  • Life Insurance, short and long term disability insurance

  • 401(k)

  • Wellness programs

  • Annual professional development budget

  • Financial planning and legal advice

Our Core Values

Our employees are the heart of the company and only by having a core set of beliefs and values will we be successful. We hire and live by these core values:

  • We value each other

  • We get stuff done

  • We believe humility drives learning

  • We embrace failure

  • We are committed to open source

Visit our careers page to learn more about working at InfluxData.

InfluxData is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected veteran status or any other categories protected by applicable law. 

To view our Know Your Rights Poster click HERE

To view our CCPA policies click HERE

If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access this website to apply for a vacancy as a result of your disability. You can request reasonable accommodations by reaching out to the recruiting team by emailing apply@influxdata.com. 

InfluxData does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters and recruitment agencies through our website, job board or directly to employees. InfluxData will not pay fees to any third-party agency, headhunter or company that does not have a signed agreement for this position in place.

Beware of job scams and fraudulent offers! Our recruiters use @influxdata.com email addresses exclusively. We do not conduct interviews via text or instant message and we do not ask candidates to download software other than Zoom, to purchase equipment through us, or to provide sensitive personally identifiable information such as bank accounts or social security numbers. If you have been contacted by someone claiming to be from InfluxData from a different domain about a job offer, please report it as potential job fraud to law enforcement and to jobs@influxdata.com.

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative, NORAM
jobs.descriptionHtml:
InfluxData is the creator of InfluxDB, the leading time series platform used to collect, store, and analyze all time series data at any scale. Developers can query and analyze their time-stamped data in real-time to discover, interpret, and share new insights to gain a competitive edge. InfluxData is a remote-first company with a globally distributed workforce. For more information, visit www.influxdata.com.

Our sales team is growing at InfluxData and we’re now looking for a Sales Development Representative to join our North America Sales Team!

You are a hunter at heart. You relish finding creative ways to secure interest from new prospects. You’re all about working hard, supporting one another, ideating nonstop, and you have a lot of fun while doing it. You have bucket loads of grit, hustle, persistence, and a strong competitive spirit. If this is you then read on!

What you’ll be doing

  • Researching new accounts to create a strong point of view as to the value InfluxDB could bring to their DevOps, IoT, AI or Data Science use cases.

  • Creating a high volume & high quality output of daily outbound outreach into senior level contacts within your assigned target accounts to generate qualified new business meetings for your AEs

  • Engaging with contacts through email, phone, social and video

  • Passionately articulating how InfluxDB can make a major difference to new customers

  • Nurturing prospects from early stage interest through to becoming a qualified lead

What we’re looking for

  • 2+ years of SDR experience

  • Track record of top 10% performance and attainment

  • A passion for technology and a technical aptitude to master sales tools

  • Superior written and verbal communication skills, able to talk to all levels at an organization

  • Demonstrable history of meeting or exceeding a new business meetings quota

  • Experience with Outreach/SalesLoft/Lavender/Lusha/ZoomInfo/LinkedIn SalesNav

  • Experience using ChatGPT, Google Gemini or similar AI tools to create compelling prospecting emails

  • Entrepreneurial mind-set with a hunger to succeed

Applications will be accepted on a rolling basis.

Interview Information:

Our interview process begins remotely. Interviews are typically conducted via Zoom. To ensure every candidate can participate, please let us know if you are unable to access Zoom. Some roles may require an in-person meeting with a team member as part of the final stage.

We offer fantastic benefits for full time employees; in the US these include:

  • Medical/dental/vision insurance with 100% coverage for employees and dependents

  • Company contribution to your FSA

  • Flexible Time Off - take the time you need

  • Life Insurance, short and long term disability insurance

  • 401(k)

  • Wellness programs

  • Annual professional development budget

  • Financial planning and legal advice

Our Core Values

Our employees are the heart of the company and only by having a core set of beliefs and values will we be successful. We hire and live by these core values:

  • We value each other

  • We get stuff done

  • We believe humility drives learning

  • We embrace failure

  • We are committed to open source

Visit our careers page to learn more about working at InfluxData.

InfluxData is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected veteran status or any other categories protected by applicable law. 

To view our Know Your Rights Poster click HERE

To view our CCPA policies click HERE

If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access this website to apply for a vacancy as a result of your disability. You can request reasonable accommodations by reaching out to the recruiting team by emailing apply@influxdata.com. 

InfluxData does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters and recruitment agencies through our website, job board or directly to employees. InfluxData will not pay fees to any third-party agency, headhunter or company that does not have a signed agreement for this position in place.

Beware of job scams and fraudulent offers! Our recruiters use @influxdata.com email addresses exclusively. We do not conduct interviews via text or instant message and we do not ask candidates to download software other than Zoom, to purchase equipment through us, or to provide sensitive personally identifiable information such as bank accounts or social security numbers. jobs.title: Director of Product Marketing
jobs.descriptionHtml:
InfluxData is the creator of InfluxDB, the leading time series platform used to collect, store, and analyze all time series data at any scale. Developers can query and analyze their time-stamped data in real-time to discover, interpret, and share new insights to gain a competitive edge. InfluxData is a remote-first company with a globally distributed workforce. For more information, visit www.influxdata.com.

InfluxData is looking for an experienced and talented leader of product marketing to join our rapidly growing marketing team. This is a high-impact, results-oriented role, where you will work in a collaborative team setting to conceive and execute go-to-market plans for our product lines. The Director of Product Marketing will work directly with Sales, Product Management, and Marketing to take new products to market and develop messaging and campaigns that drive acquisition and expansion.

The ideal Director of Product Marketing knows how to market developer and technical centric products and has experience with open source and infrastructure products, as well as having a deep understanding of complex, enterprise sales and buyer journeys. They’re proficient in translating technical features into clear and concise benefits, and will have a deep understanding of IT personas and industry trends and how to position value that aligns to individual pain points. 

It's an exciting time to join InfluxData and if you’re looking for an opportunity to have a lasting impact on a growing team, we encourage you to apply!

What you’ll be doing

  • Create the marketing plan for our next product release including pricing, positioning, go-to-market, and sales enablement information.

  • Acquire deep customer knowledge through market research, customer interviews / surveys and segmentation analysis

  • Create and execute on Go-to-market strategies to drive InfluxData's revenue goals

  • Develop customer pain point based messages, that differentiate InfluxData against competitors

  • Create the content to support lead generation campaigns and establish InfluxData and InfluxData's customers as thought leaders

  • Identify promising solutions based on existing products and drive direct sales campaigns

  • Create the internal and external facing sales kit to reach mid market and enterprise customers with a consistent and resonating message

  • Enable existing and new field resources on how to effectively position and sell InfluxData services

  • Successfully launch new services to customers, partners and the InfluxData field

  • Manage and develop a product marketing manager, including setting goals, providing feedback, and fostering career growth while ensuring alignment with broader organizational objectives

What you bring to the table:

  • 12+ years of product marketing experience in the software industry

  • Product marketing experience in databases, monitoring, observability or IoT

  • Expert in B2B purchasing cycles as well as the developer community

  • Proven track record in developing highly effective sales presentations and collateral

  • You've run or played a key role in a product launch before

  • You've interviewed customers and documented how the product has delivered benefit

  • You are skilled at collaborating with product management, engineering and customers to come up with great ideas for content

Bonus points if you have…

  • Experience working at an open source software company or driving revenue growth through free-to-paid customer conversion strategies

  • Hands-on development experience

  • Experience with Kubernetes and/or cloud providers, like AWS, Azure or GCP

Applications will be accepted on a rolling basis.

Interview Information:

Our interview process begins remotely. Interviews are typically conducted via Zoom. To ensure every candidate can participate, please let us know if you are unable to access Zoom. Some roles may require an in-person meeting with a team member as part of the final stage.

We offer fantastic benefits for full time employees; in the US these include:

  • Medical/dental/vision insurance with 100% coverage for employees and dependents

  • Company contribution to your FSA

  • Flexible Time Off - take the time you need

  • Life Insurance, short and long term disability insurance

  • 401(k)

  • Wellness programs

  • Annual professional development budget

  • Financial planning and legal advice

Our Core Values

Our employees are the heart of the company and only by having a core set of beliefs and values will we be successful. We hire and live by these core values:

  • We value each other

  • We get stuff done

  • We believe humility drives learning

  • We embrace failure

  • We are committed to open source

Visit our careers page to learn more about working at InfluxData.

InfluxData is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected veteran status or any other categories protected by applicable law. 

To view our Know Your Rights Poster click HERE

To view our CCPA policies click HERE

If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access this website to apply for a vacancy as a result of your disability. You can request reasonable accommodations by reaching out to the recruiting team by emailing apply@influxdata.com. 

InfluxData does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters and recruitment agencies through our website, job board or directly to employees. InfluxData will not pay fees to any third-party agency, headhunter or company that does not have a signed agreement for this position in place.

Beware of job scams and fraudulent offers! Our recruiters use @influxdata.com email addresses exclusively. We do not conduct interviews via text or instant message and we do not ask candidates to download software other than Zoom, to purchase equipment through us, or to provide sensitive personally identifiable information such as bank accounts or social security numbers. If you have been contacted by someone claiming to be from InfluxData from a different domain about a job offer, please report it as potential job fraud to law enforcement and to jobs@influxdata.com.

InfluxData is looking for an experienced and talented leader of product marketing to join our rapidly growing marketing team. This is a high-impact, results-oriented role, where you will work in a collaborative team setting to conceive and execute go-to-market plans for our product lines. The Director of Product Marketing will work directly with Sales, Product Management, and Marketing to take new products to market and develop messaging and campaigns that drive acquisition and expansion.

The ideal Director of Product Marketing knows how to market developer and technical centric products and has experience with open source and infrastructure products, as well as having a deep understanding of complex, enterprise sales and buyer journeys. They’re proficient in translating technical features into clear and concise benefits, and will have a deep understanding of IT personas and industry trends and how to position value that aligns to individual pain points. 

It's an exciting time to join InfluxData and if you’re looking for an opportunity to have a lasting impact on a growing team, we encourage you to apply!

What you’ll be doing

 - Create the marketing plan for our next product release including pricing, positioning, go-to-market, and sales enablement information.

 - Acquire deep customer knowledge through market research, customer interviews / surveys and segmentation analysis

 - Create and execute on Go-to-market strategies to drive InfluxData's revenue goals

 - Develop customer pain point based messages, that differentiate InfluxData against competitors

 - Create the content to support lead generation campaigns and establish InfluxData and InfluxData's customers as thought leaders

 - Identify promising solutions based on existing products and drive direct sales campaigns

 - Create the internal and external facing sales kit to reach mid market and enterprise customers with a consistent and resonating message

 - Enable existing and new field resources on how to effectively position and sell InfluxData services

 - Successfully launch new services to customers, partners and the InfluxData field

 - Manage and develop a product marketing manager, including setting goals, providing feedback, and fostering career growth while ensuring alignment with broader organizational objectives

What you bring to the table:

 - 12+ years of product marketing experience in the software industry

 - Product marketing experience in databases, monitoring, observability or IoT

 - Expert in B2B purchasing cycles as well as the developer community

 - Proven track record in developing highly effective sales presentations and collateral

 - You've run or played a key role in a product launch before

 - You've interviewed customers and documented how the product has delivered benefit

 - You are skilled at collaborating with product management, engineering and customers to come up with great ideas for content

Bonus points if you have…

 - Experience working at an open source software company or driving revenue growth through free-to-paid customer conversion strategies

 - Hands-on development experience

 - Experience with Kubernetes and/or cloud providers, like AWS, Azure or GCP

Applications will be accepted on a rolling basis.

Interview Information:

Our interview process begins remotely. Interviews are typically conducted via Zoom. To ensure every candidate can participate, please let us know if you are unable to access Zoom. Some roles may require an in-person meeting with a team member as part of the final stage.

We offer fantastic benefits for full time employees; in the US these include:

 - Medical/dental/vision insurance with 100% coverage for employees and dependents

 - Company contribution to your FSA

 - Flexible Time Off - take the time you need

 - Life Insurance, short and long term disability insurance

 - 401(k)

 - Wellness programs

 - Annual professional development budget

 - Financial planning and legal advice

Our Core Values

Our employees are the heart of the company and only by having a core set of beliefs and values will we be successful. We hire and live by these core values:

 - We value each other

 - We get stuff done

 - We believe humility drives learning

 - We embrace failure

 - We are committed to open source

InfluxData does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters and recruitment agencies through our website, job board or directly to employees. InfluxData will not pay fees to any third-party agency, headhunter or company that does not have a signed agreement for this position in place.

Beware of job scams and fraudulent offers! Our recruiters use @influxdata.com http://influxdata.com email addresses exclusively. We do not conduct interviews via text or instant message and we do not ask candidates to download software other than Zoom, to purchase equipment through us, or to provide sensitive personally identifiable information such as bank accounts or social security numbers. If you have been contacted by someone claiming to be from InfluxData from a different domain about a job offer, please report it as potential job fraud to law enforcement and to jobs@influxdata.com.
